movie.title: Return Of The Killer Goblin
movie.description: A group of friends return to their hometown after many years. The trip is an excuse to reminisce about old times but turns into a nightmare when they unearth their darkest memories.

movie.title: The Fury Of The Mercenaries
movie.description: When a devious plot separates CIA agent Peter Sandza from his son, Robin, the distraught father manages to see through the ruse. Taken because of his psychic abilities, Robin is being held by Ben Childress, who is studying people with supernatural powers in hopes of developing their talents as weapons. Soon Peter pairs up with Gillian, a teen who has telekinesis, to find and rescue Robin.

movie.title: ðŸŒ€ The Criminal House
movie.description: Movie not found on TMDB.

movie.title: The Halloween Creature
movie.description: Six years after being presumed dead in a fire, and just as the town prepares to finally celebrate Halloween again, Michael Myers returns to Haddonfield to continue his reign of terror.

movie.title: Blood Surf
movie.description: A shy tattoo artist must infiltrate a notorious gang of surf witches to discover what happened to her missing brother.

movie.title: Wishmaster
movie.description: The Djinn, having been released from his ancient prison, seeks to capture the soul of the woman who discovered him, thereby opening a portal and freeing his fellow Djinn to take over the earth.

movie.title: The Night Visitor
movie.description: When a suburban couple hires a new age spiritualist to help with their troubled marriage, her advice to video their lives 24/7 to help reunite the family, turns out to reveal their son is having conversations with an unseen entity, calling itself the Night Visitor.

movie.title: Journey Through Hell
movie.description: The film introduces a number of haunting ghost photos submitted by viewers, and explores the shocking truth behind them.The many frightening images that cannot be seen directly will surely shake all viewers to their very core.

movie.title: Leprechaun 5: In The Hood
movie.description: When Butch, Postmaster P, and Stray Bullet loot the local hip-hop mogul's studio to fund their demo album, the threesome unwittingly ends up with the secret of Mack Daddy's success: a magical flute. Their gigs instantly turn golden but a blood-thristy Leprechaun and an angry Mack Daddy are hot on their trail, leaving a wake of destruction tainted by politically incorrect limericks.

movie.title: Stalked
movie.description: A group of YouTubers investigate a legendary ghost town where the entire population vanished overnight. In pursuit of internet fame, they stumble upon a seemingly unoccupied farm that may hold the answers to the town's eerie disappearance.

movie.title: Sometimes They Come Back For More
movie.description: On a arctic circle radio shack, an ancient evil lurks, ready to strike at a psychologist, an army man and their collective forces.

movie.title: Nightmare Fuel
movie.description: Every October, live entertainment creeps into every town in America. People are transformed into monsters, while others pay gladly for horrific performances. But sometimes, acting isn't enough for the spirits that rule Halloween. And this year... the spirits want the encore of a lifetime.

movie.title: The Cursed Dynasty
movie.description: In the late 19th century, a brutal land baron slaughters a Roma clan, unleashing a curse on his family and village. In the days that follow, the townspeople are plagued by nightmares, the baron's son goes missing, and a boy is found murdered. The locals suspect a wild animal, but a visiting pathologist warns of a more sinister presence lurking in the woods.

movie.title: Left In Darkness
movie.description: Celia has had a rough life, with a mother who died in childbirth and a father who disappeared. Unfortunately for Celia, death is not any easier than life. When she is drugged and raped at a frat party, Celia dies from an overdose, and must battle the terrible Soul Eaters who roam the afterlife.

movie.title: Room 6
movie.description: A schoolteacher with a phobia of hospitals finds herself searching for her boyfriend inside one while teaming up with a man suffering the same ordeal that she's in.

movie.title: Silent Night, Deadly Night 3
movie.description: Ricky Caldwell, the notorious 'Killer Santa Claus', awakens from a six-year coma after being kept alive on life-support by a slightly crazed doctor experimenting with ESP and other special abilities. Ricky targets a young, clairvoyant blind woman, named Laura, whom is traveling with her brother Chris, and his girlfriend Jerri to their grandmother's house for Christmas Eve, and Ricky decides to go after her, leaving a trail of dead bodies in his wake.

movie.title: The Cursed Mine
movie.description: In the late 19th century, a brutal land baron slaughters a Roma clan, unleashing a curse on his family and village. In the days that follow, the townspeople are plagued by nightmares, the baron's son goes missing, and a boy is found murdered. The locals suspect a wild animal, but a visiting pathologist warns of a more sinister presence lurking in the woods.

movie.title: Venomous Attack
movie.description: Mutant snakes survived a terrorist attack on a government laboratory, and they now threaten the town of Santa Mira Springs, California. Seismic activity has brought snakes to the surface, where residents are being bitten. Victims can transmit the virus to healthy persons. The military puts the town under quarantine. Local physicians try to control the epidemic, while the military is primarily concerned with keeping the virus a secret.

movie.title: The Last Breath
movie.description: A group of old college friends reunite on a Caribbean scuba diving trip exploring the wreckage of a WWII battleship and find themselves trapped inside the underwater labyrinth of rusted metal surrounded by great white sharks.

movie.title: Never Have I Ever
movie.description: A group of estranged friends reunite at a secluded beach house to rebuild their broken bond. But as buried secrets emerge and tensions rise, their nostalgic getaway spirals into a paranoia, fear, and irreversible consequences none of them ever expected.

movie.title: Captive
movie.description: A group of stoners break into a house for a weekend party, but realize all is not well after finding a mysterious stranger held captive in the basement.

movie.title: The Girl In The Woods
movie.description: Preteen Carrie as she learns under the mentorship of reclusive Arthur Dean (A.D.) to reclaim her power and defend herself against the monsters that burst through from a dark dimension and killed her community.

movie.title: ðŸ”¥ Creature From Hell
movie.description: Movie not found on TMDB.

movie.title: Sacrificed
movie.description: Haunted artifacts, spooky goings-on.

movie.title: Trapped
movie.description: Kathleen Quinlan is a woman working late in her locked high-rise office building who, along with Bruce Abbott, struggles to elude an intruder trying to kill them.

movie.title: The Monster Hunt
movie.description: Residents of an East Texas town react strangely when a serial killer invades their small town world.

movie.title: Black Magic Woman
movie.description: The owner of a suburban art gallery searches for someone to perform an exorcism after a witch casts a spell on him.

movie.title: The Night Curse
movie.description: After moving into an abandoned orphanage, the inhabitants realize that the building is cursed by a vengeful spirit, known as Reatrei. Tragedies start to befall one after another until they find what her curse entails.

movie.title: A Twisted Night
movie.description: A non-hosted anthology movie of weird, terrifying, funny and bloody horror tales made in a retrospective VHS (Video Home System) mix.

movie.title: ðŸŒ€ Evlurks
movie.description: Movie not found on TMDB.

movie.title: Killer Possession
movie.description: A hospital nurse is possessed by an evil spirit, and proceeds to kill off the hospital's patients.

movie.title: Halloween Night
movie.description: A horribly burned man escapes from a mental institution and terrorizes teenagers at a party.

movie.title: Deadly Camping
movie.description: A psychotic family kills people that trespass on their own lonely island.

movie.title: A Sick Littgame
movie.description: Faux-mondo movie featuring sex, drugs, violence and the familiar dulcet tones of Joel Holt.

movie.title: The Fury Of The Wild
movie.description: When a devious plot separates CIA agent Peter Sandza from his son, Robin, the distraught father manages to see through the ruse. Taken because of his psychic abilities, Robin is being held by Ben Childress, who is studying people with supernatural powers in hopes of developing their talents as weapons. Soon Peter pairs up with Gillian, a teen who has telekinesis, to find and rescue Robin.

movie.title: Easy Target
movie.description: A serial killer finds the perfect easy target

movie.title: The Retreat
movie.description: Two vloggers were invited to a cabin in the woods for the evening for a standard press review but the night didn't go as smoothly as they both envisioned.

movie.title: ðŸ”¥ The Monster Disease
movie.description: Movie not found on TMDB.

movie.title: Dark Seduction
movie.description: A hard-boiled love triangle between a private eye and two bloodsucking dames. The film was actually shot in 1984 and was considered lost and unfinished for decades before being rediscovered and completed by Greg Travis, the film's star, co-writer and director. It was then briefly screened in theaters and ushered out onto VOD.

movie.title: The Son Of Satan
movie.description: Six people are trapped within the confines of their old high school during their 10th high school reunion with a psychotic, masked preacher who kills them off for their sinful lives they have made for themselves.

movie.title: The Coven Leaders
movie.description: While away at college, Autumn becomes associated with a Coven of witches. After being visited by her dead grandmother from the spirit world, Autumn realizes that she must use her magical powers for good rather than evil. She battles for control of her Coven with the evil raven-haired Vallie. Vallie threatens to sacrifice Autumn's boyfriend Gabe. Autumn must fight to save him, and the fate of her Coven.

movie.title: Lured To A Killer
movie.description: Two mermaid sisters, who end up performing at a nightclub, face cruel and bloody choices when one of them falls in love with a beautiful young man.

movie.title: Nights At The Cottage
movie.description: Recently fired and desperate for work, a troubled young man named Mike agrees to take a position as a night security guard at an abandoned theme restaurant: Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria. But he soon discovers that nothing at Freddy's is what it seems.

movie.title: The Coven Of Dark Desires
movie.description: While away at college, Autumn becomes associated with a Coven of witches. After being visited by her dead grandmother from the spirit world, Autumn realizes that she must use her magical powers for good rather than evil. She battles for control of her Coven with the evil raven-haired Vallie. Vallie threatens to sacrifice Autumn's boyfriend Gabe. Autumn must fight to save him, and the fate of her Coven.

movie.title: ðŸŒ€ Grandma'S House
movie.description: Movie not found on TMDB.

movie.title: Night Encounters
movie.description: The line between the supernatural and guerrilla filmmaking becomes blurred when a director chooses an abandoned hotel to shoot her horror movie.

movie.title: The Forbidden Invention
movie.description: An early experimental short film based on Faust.

movie.title: Attacked By Spirits
movie.description: A horror documentary series featuring many of the "ghost videos in which the submitter panics" that users fear the most. Includes 10 episodes in total, including "Small Box" and "I Couldn't Say It All Along".

movie.title: The Cult Trap
movie.description: When a young woman relocates to a small town in Europe, she notices the place has something weird. As time goes by, she starts to fear for her life. Based on actual events and in the book the day she became plastic.

movie.title: The Witch Of New Orleans
movie.description: In 1630, a farmer relocates his family to a remote plot of land on the edge of a forest where strange, unsettling things happen. With suspicion and paranoia mounting, each family member's faith, loyalty and love are tested in shocking ways.

movie.title: The Cool Kids
movie.description: A group of kids who go up to the mountains to party find themselves snowed in.

movie.title: Off His Meds
movie.description: A simple, domestic love story about a man who takes his skin off for his girlfriend, and why it probably wasn't the best idea...

movie.title: Sleepless Nights
movie.description: Legendary underground director Todd Sheets (Bonehill Road, Goblin, Zombie Bloodbath) invites you into a gore-soaked netherworld of nocturnal suffering as he presents seven spine-ripping tales of madness, possession and despair from the independent horror world. So lie back, switch the lights off, and get ready for some very disturbing dreams.

movie.title: The Devil With You
movie.description: Hoping to find answers to her estranged father's mysterious illness, a young woman visits his old villa and uncovers a horrifying truth from the past.
